sentences.en: Fire broke out on the stricken ship.
Foreign aid workers will not be allowed into the stricken areas.
sentences.cn: 国外救援人员不准进入灾区。

sentences.en: He was panic-stricken at the thought he might never play again.
sentences.cn: 一想到自己可能永远不能再参加比赛，他就无比恐慌。

sentences.en: He was stricken at twenty-one with a crippling malady.
Medical aid must be sent to the stricken area posthaste.
sentences.cn: 灾区需用医药,急如星火.

sentences.en: Panic-stricken travellers fled for the borders.
sentences.cn: 惊慌失措的旅行者逃往边境。

sentences.en: She raised her stricken face and begged for help.
sentences.cn: 她仰起苦闷的脸，乞求帮助。

sentences.en: She was stricken by pain and began to vomit.
sentences.cn: 她感到一阵疼痛,开始呕吐起来.

sentences.en: Supplies of food and medicine were rushed to the stricken city.
sentences.cn: 食物和药品被迅速运往受灾的城市.

sentences.en: The British Red Cross has sent four planeloads of relief supplies to the stricken areas.
sentences.cn: 英国红十字会已向灾区发送了4架飞机的救济物资。

sentences.en: The panic - stricken fled in all directions.
sentences.cn: 惊慌的人群向四面八方逃去.

sentences.en: The planes airdropped relief supplies to the stricken area.
sentences.cn: 飞机向灾区空投救灾物资.

sentences.en: The Queen was grief-stricken over his death.
sentences.cn: 女王为他的去世悲痛不已。

sentences.en: The two heroic sisters quickly headed off the panic - stricken sheep.
sentences.cn: 两个勇敢的小姐妹赶忙上前拦住受惊的羊群.

sentences.en: There was a stampede of panic - stricken crowd from the burning hotel.
sentences.cn: 一群惊惶失措的人们,从失火的旅馆中跑了出来.

sentences.en: They have issued the calamity - stricken people with food.
